function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Escalating inequality due to the pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inclusion of irrelevant papers that do not meet the study criteria could lead to inaccurate findings.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate classification or categorization of interventions may affect the reliability of the findings.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conflicts between reviewers in selecting relevant citations may introduce bias and affect the study’s integrity.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative psychosocial and economic effects of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in enforcement of quarantine and economic support measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social support for at-risk and vulnerable groups","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of economic interventions for impoverished households","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social support for vulnerable and at-risk groups","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited capacity of health care systems in low and middle-income countries","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccessibility of psychological interventions in some regions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited financial resources and low access to comprehensive health care in lmics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty and unpredictability of the future of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Authors in close contact during manuscript drafting","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collection and reanalysis of clinical data by multiple authors","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through close contact, respiratory droplets, fomites, and contaminated surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of airborne transmission through airborne particles with diameters smaller than 5 \\\\u03bcm","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Involvement of building environment and human behavior in the transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inhalation of the virus carried in airborne particles from cough or vocalization","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Droplet spray onto facial membranes from cough or vocalization","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in cruise ship rooms up to 17 days after vacated","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Persistence of sars-cov-2 in aerosols in different environmental conditions","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 remaining viable and infectious in aerosols for hours","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus inactivation time reduced dramatically with an increase in incubation temperature","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survivability of sars-cov-2 on different surfaces","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variable persistence of sars-cov-2 on porous surfaces","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 stability enhanced by bovine serum albumin, increasing potential for fomite transmission in indoor environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential aerosol transmission of sars-cov-2 in specific medical procedures, increasing the risk of airborne infection.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Claimed risk of short-and medium-range person-to-person distance in aerosol transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential risk of indoor airborne transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear role of airborne particles in virus transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Transmission of virus by asymptomatic individuals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wide range of droplet sizes emitted during speaking and coughing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in discriminating between airborne transmission and transmission through respiratory droplets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of viral rna in aerosols in hospital environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investigating size distribution of airborne sars-cov-2 droplets in a specific location during the covid-19 outbreak.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resuspension of virus-laden aerosols from the surface of protective apparel worn by medical staff.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resuspension of particle matter from walking events in indoor spaces.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Resuspension of bioaerosols and virus particles in the built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of quantitative data for defining environmental control measures against covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Outbreaks of covid-19 linked to common indoor environmental factors","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation in the restaurant led to the spread of covid-19 through aerosol transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High infection rates in a call center in seoul, south korea, due to close proximity and potential aerosol transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 in a crowded workplace environment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High secondary infection rate in choir practice","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of infection in meat-processing plant","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 in a meat-processing plant due to poor ventilation and crowded environment.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 through the air at a distance of 2m or more in a confined and crowded environment.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Control of infectious aerosols by ventilation, filtration, and uv germicidal irradiation.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Propagation of sars-cov-2 aerosols in the built environment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"}]}
